languages.text: Даже став ледяными статуями, верные прихожане продолжают молить Императора о спасении.

traits.locale_text: Даже став ледяными статуями, верные прихожане продолжают молить Императора о спасении.

languages.text: Even as ice sculptures, the faithful continue to beg the Emperor for salvation.
languages.original_text: Даже став ледяными статуями, верные прихожане продолжают молить Императора о спасении.

traits.locale_text: Even as icy sculptures, the faithful keep begging the Emperor for salvation.
Even as icy sculptures, the faithful keep begging the Emperor for salvation.
Even as ice sculptures, the faithful continue to beg the Emperor for salvation.
Even as ice sculptures, the faithful continue to beg the Emperor for salvation.
Even as ice sculptures, the faithful continue to beg the Emperor for salvation.

languages.text: 即便已经被冻成了冰雕，这群虔诚的信徒依然在祈求帝皇的救赎。
languages.original_text: Even as ice sculptures, the faithful continue to beg the Emperor for salvation.

traits.locale_text: 即便已经被冻成了冰雕，这群虔诚的信徒依然在祈求帝皇的救赎。

languages.text: Incluso como esculturas de hielo, los fieles siguen suplicando la salvación al Emperador.
languages.original_text: Even as ice sculptures, the faithful continue to beg the Emperor for salvation.

traits.locale_text: Incluso como esculturas de hielo, los fieles siguen suplicando la salvación al Emperador.

languages.text: 氷の彫像となってなお、熱心な信徒は皇帝による救済がもたらされるよう祈り続けている。
languages.original_text: Even as ice sculptures, the faithful continue to beg the Emperor for salvation.

traits.locale_text: 氷の彫像となってなお、熱心な信徒は皇帝による救済がもたらされるよう祈り続けている。

languages.text: Même sous forme de sculptures de glace, les fidèles continuent de supplier l'Empereur de leur accorder le salut.
languages.original_text: Even as ice sculptures, the faithful continue to beg the Emperor for salvation.

traits.locale_text: Même sous forme de sculptures de glace, les fidèles continuent de supplier l'Empereur de leur accorder le salut.

languages.text: Selbst als Eisskulpturen bitten die Gläubigen den Imperator weiterhin um Erlösung.
languages.original_text: Even as ice sculptures, the faithful continue to beg the Emperor for salvation.

traits.locale_text: Selbst als Eisskulpturen bitten die Gläubigen den Imperator weiterhin um Erlösung.

languages.text: İnançlılar, buz tutmuş heykellere dönüşmüşken bile selamet için İmparator'a yalvarıyorlar.
languages.original_text: Even as ice sculptures, the faithful continue to beg the Emperor for salvation.

traits.locale_text: İnançlılar, buz tutmuş heykeller hâlindeyken bile İmparator'a selamet için yalvarıyorlar.
